name: Stick NinjaStar
description:
◉ ==== STICK NINJA STAR === ◉

Stick Ninja Star is the best ninja game for you to test your brain skills.

◉ How To Play ?

Hold your finger on screen to make the stick grow. Stretch the stick in order to reach and walk on the platforms. Watch out! If the stick is not long enough, you will fall down!

Jump in the action and see How far can you go?

◉ => Feature :

◉ 4 new Heroes to unlock! unlock new Heroes.
◉ 4 new beautiful scenes.
◉ New Slash game mode!
◉ New Music
◉ Unlimited Level

Don't Waste Your Time Start Playing With Ninja
